TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TextDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextDirection AnyRtl = int32(2)

summary.para: Text direction is using "any-RTL" algorithm. The paragraph direction is RTL if it contains any strong RTL character, otherwise it is LTR if it contains any strong LTR characters. If there are neither, the paragraph direction is the view's resolved layout direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextDirection FirstStrong = int32(1)

summary.para: Text direction is using "first strong algorithm". The first strong directional character determines the paragraph direction. If there is no strong directional character, the paragraph direction is the view's resolved layout direction.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextDirection Inherit = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextDirection Locale = int32(5)

summary.para: Text direction is coming from the system Locale.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextDirection Ltr = int32(3)

summary.para: Text direction is forced to LTR.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.TextDirection Rtl = int32(4)

summary.para: Text direction is forced to RTL.
